title: Episode 69: The Bobo Doll Study, Part 1: The Original
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: Dr. Ryan Martin and guest cohost, Taylor Gulbrand, talk with Dr. Kate Burns about the 1961 study, Transmission of Aggression Through Imitation of Aggressive Models (aka "the bobo doll study") by Bandura, Ross, and Ross.  This episode is part one of a three-part series on this famous line of research.  The series is part of the 2019 UW-Green Bay Psychology Week, brought to you by Bellin Health Psychiatric Center.  Learn more at uwgb.edu/psychweek
itunes:subtitle: Dr. Ryan Martin and guest cohost, Taylor Gulbrandâ€¦
